title: League is actively crashing and then making it impossible for me to do anything
body:
So i basically had a few crashes, Got penalized and all, but worked out that league is starting a process in task manager that refuses to close that actively stops me from being able to do anything to try and reconnect to a game.

The key thing to note of this process, is that for some reason it actively uses the OLD client's image (other then it's refusal to close).
